text: Search this document: This document describes the Legacy Desktop Client used for all versions of MediationZone prior to 9.0.0. The Legacy Desktop is still required for certain functionality that is currently not available in the regular Desktop and includes: The ECS Restricted Fields and Bulk Edit features, see the documentation for ECS Inspection for more information Chapters The following chapters and sections are included: Installation and Configuration of Legacy Desktop Legacy Desktop Overview System Monitor
title: Legacy Desktop - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
